data.title: Good food, good atmosphere
data.text: Good menu, food well prepared and presented attractively. Good bar, and efficient wait staff.  One of the better restaurants in Medford, and prices are somewhere between moderate and high.  Located in a remodeled old railroad station, with old station mementos and decor preserved, dark wood and dim lighting.  Free parking lot.

owner_response.author: PortersMedfordOR, Manager at Porters - Dining at the Depot, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
So glad to hear you enjoyed your visit!

Your friends at Porters
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: This Restaurant is GORGEOUS!!!
data.text: My husband and I have been regulars at Porter's since we moved to Medford in mid-2014.  Our favorite things to order were the fabulous Seafood Platter (no longer on the menu) and the Flourless Chocolate Cake (no longer on the menu).  Last year we went to Porter's for Thanksgiving with another couple; it was quite good.  We're going again this year!

owner_response.author: PortersMedfordOR, Manager at Porters - Dining at the Depot, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Thank you! We look forward to having you back.

Your friends at Porters
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Very nice meal
data.text: I stopped in here for dinner after reading reviews. I thought it was very nice I enjoyed my meal the atmosphere was nice and the service was excellent. I started with the beet and goat cheese salad and it was large enough for two and then I tried the piccata prawns it was good but the prawns were a little over cooked but still a very nice presentation. I would definitely give this place another try on my way through town.

owner_response.author: PortersMedfordOR, Manager at Porters - Dining at the Depot, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Thank you for your review. So glad you enjoyed the food!

Your friends at Porters
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Fish tacos + beer + fun atmosphere
data.text: I came here with a girlfriend for food and drinks and was very impressed! Our server was friendly. She let us sample beer before purchasing, and the food exceeded my expectations (get the fish tacos- SO YUMMY.) Definitely a great place for a special occasion or the occasional night out.

owner_response.author: PortersMedfordOR, Manager at Porters - Dining at the Depot, responded to this review

Thanks so much for your review! Hope to have you back soon.

data.title: Enjoyable company
data.text: This was the conclusion of a business interview.  Really enjoyed the potential people with whom I would work.  The setting is unique and historical.  For me, the chicken marsala was delicious.  However, my date had the ahi tuna and he thought it was greatly lacking.  I'm not sure if they have a specialty, beef, seafood...  But everyone enjoyed the evening.

owner_response.author: PortersMedfordOR, Manager at Porters - Dining at the Depot, responded to this review

Thank you for your review. Glad you enjoyed the experience!

data.title: Good dinner, great dessert.
data.text: We had the prime rib for dinner.  The food was good as was the service.  The bread pudding for dessert is not to be missed.  It was one of the best I've ever had and I love bread pudding.

data.title: Our favorite
data.text: We treat ourselves to Porters on our anniversary every year, plus our family members. Great happy hour to start, wonderful wait staff and ambience in the dining room. The train 🚂 usually comes by 5-6 for the extra atmosphere.

owner_response.author: PortersMedfordOR, Manager at Porters - Dining at the Depot, responded to this review

data.text: We have enjoyed eating in the bar and on the patio with children and without.  It has always been a pleasure and a delight to the palate!

data.title: Really good as usual!
data.text: There are not many really good restaurants in Medford but Porter's is one of them. We were there on our anniversary which happened to be on a Sunday. Sundays are Happy Hours all day in the bar and the values occur throughout the menu. Service was excellent and the various items we ordered were delicious. You need to try this!

owner_response.author: PortersMedfordOR, Manager at Porters - Dining at the Depot, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Thanks so much for your review!

owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Average....but was highly recommended!
data.text: This was a highly recommended restaurant in Medford, Oregon where we were traveling through.  Had a reservation for 5:00 pm and got seated at 5:20 pm (they only had one hostess was the reason). The ambiance (an old railway depot) was very nice.  Ordered a beet salad which was excellent...it came with warm goat cheese balls.  My wife ordered the Rogue salad was rated by her standards as okay.  The main course ordered was a rib eye steak ... which (although cooked as requested - medium rare) was about 20% fat.  Just a very poor cut.  Cost $33.00!  The 'mashed potatoes' just didn't taste right and had a metallic flavor to them.  My wife want a side of oysters ( she got 5 of them for $20.00).  The oysters were lightly breaded and tasted fine.  Overall an average meal with high prices and a nice ambiance.

data.title: A good place for a special occasion
data.text: Good food, usually good service, good menu selections.  Lots of outdoor seating in pleasant weather.  Lively & cheery separate bar area for happy hour or dinner.

owner_response.author: PortersMedfordOR, Manager at Porters - Dining at the Depot, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Thanks for being here!

Your friends at Porters
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Expected More...
data.text:
In town for business and Porters was highly recommended. I thought the service was a bit on the slow side but the waiter was friendly. It appeared to be a fairly quiet night in the restaurant. It does have a  neat interior to look around at.

I asked the waiter if they tend to over or under cook their steaks and he said under so I ordered a filet med/well. It came out well done, not a hint of pink in it but at least it had good flavor. 

For dessert I ordered the creme brulee, and as I informed the waiter, it was probably the worst creme brulee I had ever tasted (and I've had a few). It was removed from my bill and that concluded the night.

data.title: Dont Miss Porters in Medford
data.text: This restaurant has a awesome atmosphere paired with excellent food. The seafood and meat dishes are perfect. Don't miss this place

owner_response.author: PortersMedfordOR, Manager at Porters - Dining at the Depot, responded to this review

data.text: I love This place to sit and relax in an excellent atmosphere. I would have given 5 stars but for the price i feel the food needs a looking into. Good but not excellent. Love this place though.

data.title: What Happened?
data.text: This use to be a higher end dining experience. However, on our last visit there, the food was very bland and definitely not worth the money we paid. Very sad.

data.title: Excellent fine restaurant for steaks and seafood
data.text: My wife and I had dinner at Porters - Dining at the Depot during our visit to Medford, primarily because the popular reviews. Thankfully, the food and service largely lived up to their reputation, and we were pleased with our visit. This is an excellent fine restaurant for steaks and seafood.

owner_response.author: PortersMedfordOR, Manager at Porters - Dining at the Depot, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
So glad to hear you enjoyed your visit!

data.title: Great place
data.text: Nice spot . Staff was great . Food was really good. If able I would say sit outside. Trains also still pass by the restaurant.

owner_response.author: PortersMedfordOR, Manager at Porters - Dining at the Depot, responded to this review

Thank you for your review! The patio is still open for another week or two. Come see us again soon.

data.title: Service great, food not so much.
data.text:
In all fairness. we went on Monday night. I know some resturants give their primary chef the night off after a busy weekend. I can only hope that is what happened. I had Pork Tenderloin with peat chutney, and my Husband had Oysters. Mine had little flavor with my chutney was a mushy pear sauce
 My husband said his oysters were also flavorless. The service was good and the front desk very pleasant. Wished the food had been better.

data.title: Dinner
data.text: The front desk at The Hilton recommended this place for dinner. We had been driving for twelve hours and hated to get back in the car again. Nothing really good around The Hilton so we decided to give it a try.  We were not disappointed, it was fabulous. The service was excellent, the food was outstanding and the atmosphere was great. Would definitely recommend this place to anyone. So happy we took The Hiltons suggestion.

owner_response.author: PortersMedfordOR, Manager at Porters - Dining at the Depot, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Thanks so much for being here!

Your friends at Porters

data.title: Historically amazing
data.text: We were told Porter's was a great restaurant so we decided to go.  Service was wonderful (we had Michael as our server); food was beyond good.  Ambience was even better.
